articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's work published in Finland 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's famous work "10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation for the reunification of the country" was brought out in booklet by the Finnish national committee for the study of the Juche idea.
 In a preface the booklet said that the committee decided to publish a work representing reverence for Kim Il Sung, a prominent state leader, on the occasion of his 90th birth anniversary.    
 A ceremony of releasing the work took place in Helsinki on April 7.

articles.content:
Camping begins at children's camps 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A camping began at the children's camps across the country on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 Meetings to receive campers were held at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp, the Songdowon International Children's Camp, the Sokam Children's Camp, the Phihyon Children's Camp, the Kaesong Children's Camp and other camps on April 14 and 15.    
 The campers joyfully spent the significant holiday, having amusement and sports games.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam meets foreign delegations and delegates
Foreign diplomats visit Kimilsungia show
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam meets foreign delegations and delegates
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the political bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had friendly talks with the visiting political party delegations and delegates of various countries at the Mansudae Assembly Hall yesterday.
 Kim Yong Nam met and had a talk with a Chinese government cultural delegation led by Sun Jiazheng, Minister of Culture, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall that day.    
 The head of the delegation said that Jiang Zemin and leader Kim Jong Il have paid deep attention to the Chinese-Korean friendship. The mutual visits of the top leaders of the two countries marked a good occasion in developing the Chinese-Korean friendly relations, he noted.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok meets foreign delegations
Reception given for delegations and of Juche idea study organizations
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok meets foreign delegations
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and conversed with Harchand Singh, general secretary of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, a delegation of the Cambodian Youth Association led by its chairman Men Kuon and a delegation of the Indonesian Women's Congress led by its chairwoman Inne E. A. Soekaryo at the Mansudae Assembly Hall yesterday.
 The guests said that while staying in the DPRK they deeply felt that boundless is the reverence of the Korean people for President Kim Il Sung who devoted his all to the prosperity and development of the country and the happiness of the people.    
 They positively supported the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the reunification of the country on the principle of national independence and by a federal formula in a peaceful way.

articles.content:
Mangyongdae visited by foreigners
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The visiting representatives of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and international organizations visited Mangyongdae yesterday on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 The guests marched as far as his old home in Mangyongdae from the revolutionary monument to the fork leading to Mangyongdae.    
 They also visited the 4th kimilsungia show on the same day.
